algorithm: The new algorithm will calculate the score for each bin based on the remaining capacity and the size of the item, and then return the scores as a Numpy array. If the remaining capacity of a bin is greater than or equal to the maximum capacity minus the item size, the score will be set to -np.inf. Otherwise, the score will be (max_capacity - remaining_capacity) / item. The algorithm will prioritize assigning the item to bins with smaller remaining capacities.
